General.Name: Aeon Credit Service Bhd
General.Description: AEON Credit Service (M) Berhad offers consumer financial services in Malaysia. The company provides easy payment and personal financing schemes based on Islamic principles; and issues payment cards under the Visa and MasterCard brand names. It also offers credit and prepaid cards; AEON Wallet app; hire purchase financing for motor vehicles; insurance brokerage; motorcycle, auto, SME, and objective financing; and other related services. It operates through a network of cash deposit machines and e-money kiosks, as well as through various branches. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. AEON Credit Service (M) Berhad is a subsidiary of AEON Financial Service Co., Ltd.
